tool_description: MLB NBA NFL NHL sports data , statistics intelligence and analytics
name: Sportalytics
title: Sportalytics

api_list.name: games
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportalytics.p.rapidapi.com/mlb/games/2021/ATL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportalytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sportalytics.p.rapidapi.com/{sport}/games/{year}/{team}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportalytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
